snippet: Devyani Khobragade faced the new charges of visa fraud, two days after a judge accepted her claim of diplomatic immunity and dismissed earlier charges.
abstract: Grand jury in New York reindicts Indian diplomat Devyani Khobragade, whose arrest and strip-search in 2013 in United States created tensions between United States and India; new charges of visa fraud come two days after judge accepted her claim of diplomatic immunity and dismissed earlier charges of mistreating housekeeper.
lead_paragraph: Devyani Khobragade faced the new charges of visa fraud, two days after a judge accepted her claim of diplomatic immunity and dismissed earlier charges.

headline.main: Diplomat From India Is Indicted Again Over Housekeeper
headline.print_headline: Diplomat From India Is Indicted Again Over Housekeeper
